entities.name: potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry Potter. He is mentioned as being in detention and having a tryout for Quidditch Keeper.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: A student who is angry with Harry Potter and mentions that she wanted to do a tryout with the whole team. She is described as being in a towering temper.

entities.name: keeper
entities.description: The position on the Quidditch team that Harry Potter was trying out for.

entities.name: umbridge woman
entities.description: A teacher who gave Harry Potter detention. She is mentioned as being unfair and unjust.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: A mysterious entity that Harry Potter told the truth about to Umbridge woman.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The location where the conversation between Harry and Angelina took place. It is described as a large hall with an entrance.

entities.name: quidditch pitch
entities.description: A special area for Quidditch tryouts that Angelina booked.

relationships.description: Angelina is angry with Harry Potter because he did not show up to the Quidditch tryout. She pokes him in the chest and scolds him.
Umbridge gave Harry Potter detention for telling her the truth about You-Know-Who.
